# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to you, estimated at $1,000,000. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure such a high-quality product at a favorable discount. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
